Class Powerup

  • java.lang.Object
    • Powerup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Carryable

    public abstract class Powerup
extends java.lang.Object
implements Carryable
    The PowerUp is something the player can pick up and use to kill players or alter the map
    Author:
    jadonlam
